title: Relates to charges for certain services rendered by a physician
summary: Prohibits a physician from charging a fee for any service rendered during a period of seventy-two hours from the time a service which was advertised as free of charge has been rendered; provides that a physician may charge a fee for services specifically excluded in the advertisement which offered such free services.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to charges for certain services rendered by a physician
